org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering

Class MultithreadedRendererDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering.Renderer
      • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering.MultithreadedRendererDispatcher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChunkRendererDispatcher, StripRendererDispatcher

    public abstract class MultithreadedRendererDispatcher
extends Renderer
    An abstract class for creating a Dispatcher that performs ray-casting rendering, but distributes the work load onto multiple threads for improving performance and efficiency of the program.

    A sub-class of MultithreadedRendererDispatcher would assign classes that follow the naming convention of Render<rendering-strategy>, for example RenderStrip. The individual work unit of the Dispatcher (such as RenderStrip) must implement the Callable interface of type Void.

    Once the Callable work unit is submitted to the thread-pool for execution, its Future is stored in a queue.

    Since:
    2019-01-12, v0.5
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Alex Kalinins
